name: Suchema
title: Chief Product & Technology Officer
summary: Experienced technology leader with a track record of building and scaling products, engineering teams, and technical strategy. Passionate about clean architecture, developer experience, and shipping products that matter.

highlights: Led product and engineering teams across the full product lifecycle
Defined and executed technical strategy aligned with business objectives
Built and scaled engineering culture focused on quality and velocity
Drove architectural decisions for scalability and maintainability
Grew engineering team from 5 to 25 across multiple product squads
Introduced modern CI/CD practices and infrastructure-as-code
Shipped major product features that drove significant revenue growth
Full-stack development across web and mobile platforms
Mentored junior developers and led technical design reviews
Built core systems handling significant transaction volumes
